titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, to Stephen Babington, Secretary to Government at Bombay, Political Department

mods.abstract: Letter describes the circumstances behind, and settling of, a dispute over a house between Stephen Watson Henshaw and Mohamed ben Nasir [Muá¸¥ammed bin Nasir] , in response to a letter of complaint by the latter.
